document_data.name: Ubriien Orlyn
document_data.mainbody: '''Ubriien Orlyn''' was one of the most powerful [[magelord]]s of the kingdom of [[Athalantar]].
document_data.History:
Ubriien was the first leader of the magelords, before [[Neldryn Hawklyn]], and the first Royal Mage of [[Belaur Aumar]], as which he dominated the nation. He loved to travel the country in disguise to spy on people.

However, in [[222 DR]], disguised as an [[elf]], he tried to cast a spell on an alert [[dwarf|dwarven]] [[axelord]] at a feast, but the dwarf killed him.{{Cite dragon/228/The Athalantan Campaign}}
